title: Menai Bridge
name: Menai Heritage
address: Thomas Telford Centre,Mona Road, Menai Bridge LL59 5EA
hours: See website for seasonal opening hours
content: Community project to celebrate two world famous bridges; the Menai Suspension Bridge, built by Thomas Telford, and the Britannia Bridge, built by Robert Stephenson. Museum has exhibits of artefacts and drawings, films, quizzes and qualified guides.
